title: APT ORB / rugcoat
description: This is the fifth Shivers in the coat quest. It is Very Difficult.

links.title: You: "I will be there soon. Wherever it i..."
links.text: I will be there soon. Wherever it is!

links.title: Shivers: "Yes... Reunion...! Listen within th..."
links.text: Yes... Reunion...! Listen within the circles that capture the electrical world… If you can hear me then, we will be united…

links.title: You: "That's great. Tell me what circle I..."
links.text: That's great. Tell me what circle I've got to run into this time.

links.title: Shivers: "So near... Listen within the circle..."
links.text: So near... Listen within the circles that capture the electrical world… If you can hear me then, we will be united…

links.title: You: "You better be ready when I find you..."
links.text: You better be ready when I find you, weird voice! I'm going to hurt you!

links.title: Shivers: "Please do not... Just listen within..."
links.text: Please do not... Just listen within the circles that capture the electrical world… If you can hear me then, we will be united…
